mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_관리자정보기본 조회 (EmpMapper.getEmp) */ SELECT emp_no ,mngr_enpswd ,tmpr_pswd_yn ,pswd_err_nmtm ,bfr_enpswd ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_EMP" WHERE 1=1 AND emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_관리자정보기본 수정 (EmpMapper.updateEmp) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_EMP" SET mngr_enpswd = coalesce(#{mngrEnpswd}, mngr_enpswd) ,tmpr_pswd_yn = coalesce(#{tmprPswdYn}, tmpr_pswd_yn) ,pswd_err_nmtm = coalesce(#{pswdErrNmtm}, pswd_err_nmtm) ,bfr_enpswd = coalesce(#{bfrEnpswd}, bfr_enpswd) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND emp_no = #{empNo}
